verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The nails in your hands
The nails in your feet
They tell me how much
You love me
The thorns on your brow
They tell me how
You bore so much pain
To love me
And when the heavens pass away
All your scars will still remain
And forever they will say
Just how much you love me, so I want to say

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Forever my love, forever my heart, forever my life is yours
Forever my love, forever my heart, forever my life is yours
Forever my love
